```{r setup, echo=FALSE, include=FALSE, message=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(oce)
library(cowplot)
```

#Looks like JALD2 got knocked out by ice?
#JALD1+KALD1+KALD2: very consistant low winter current in those lagoons?

```{r look_at_data, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
source('scr/TCMdata_import.R')

#fill in daylight savings time issue (result from keeping format in Alaska time)
TCM_Temp$DT[is.na(TCM_Temp$DT)]<-as.POSIXct("2019-03-10 02:00:00")
TCM_Curr$DT[is.na(TCM_Curr$DT)]<-as.POSIXct("2019-03-10 02:00:00")

ggplot(TCM_Temp, aes(DT, Temperature))+
  geom_line(aes(color=Station))+
  theme_cowplot()

ggplot(TCM_Curr, aes(DT, Speed_cm_s))+
  geom_line(aes(color=Station))+
  facet_wrap(~Station, scales="free")+
  theme_cowplot()

ggplot(TCM_Curr, aes(DT, Vel_N))+
  geom_line(color="blue")+
  geom_line(aes(DT, Vel_E), color="black")+
  facet_wrap(~Station, scales="free")+
  theme_cowplot()
```

#Flag JALD2 and EELD1

```{r flags, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

TCM_Curr %>% filter(Station=="JALD2"&
                    DT<as.POSIXct("2018-08-28 01:00:00", tz="US/Alaska")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(DT, Speed_cm_s))+
  geom_line()+
  theme_cowplot()

TCM_Curr %>% filter(Station=="EELD1"&
                    DT>as.POSIXct("2019-06-28 01:00:00", tz="US/Alaska")&
                      DT<as.POSIXct("2019-07-05 01:00:00", tz="US/Alaska")) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(DT, Speed_cm_s))+
  geom_point()+
  theme_cowplot()

TCM_Curr<-TCM_Curr%>%
  mutate(flags=
           case_when(Station=="JALD2"& DT>as.POSIXct("2018-08-27 01:00:00", tz="US/Alaska")~"BAD",
                    Station=="EELD1"& DT>as.POSIXct("2019-06-29 05:00:00", tz="US/Alaska")&DT<as.POSIXct("2019-07-04 20:00:00", tz="US/Alaska") ~"QM"))


ggplot(TCM_Curr, aes(DT, Speed_cm_s))+
  geom_point(aes(color=flags))+
  facet_wrap(~Station, scales="free")+
  theme_cowplot()

```
